TitlePage.Title: SRGroups
TitlePage.Subtitle: Self-relicating groups acting on regular rooted trees
TitlePage.Author:
Samuel King
University Drive, Callaghan NSW 2308
samuel.s.king@newcastle.edu.au

Sarah Shotter
University Drive, Callaghan NSW 2308
sarah.shotter@newcastle.edu.au

Stephan Tornier
University Drive, Callaghan NSW 2308
stephan.tornier@newcastle.edu.au https://www.newcastle.edu.au/profile/stephan-tornier
TitlePage.Abstract: SRGroups is a package for searching up self-replicating groups of regular rooted trees and performing computations on these groups. This package allows the user to generate more self-replicating groups at greater depths with its in-built functions, and is an extension of the transgrp package.
